intro.message-part-1: A true knowledge lover, always looking to learn more and share information. Working with web development since 2019, developing for performant and scalable projects while learning something new everyday.
intro.message-part-2: To build my projects, I use Typescript and Javascript as main programming technologies.
intro.title: Web Developer

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Web Developer & Content Creator
about.intro-1: I am a person with a desire to grow by learning new things every day. Driven by curiosity, I fell in love with web development and design.
about.intro-2: I am very interested in opportunities to work with the latest technologies on challenging projects that would push my skills to the end. I like programming and I am specially ambitious on the kind of projects that solves daily problems.

projects.title: My Projects and Works
projects.intro-part-1: Each project is a unique piece of development üéè. You can see all my personal projects on my

content.maron-themes: Visual Studio Code Theme extension pack made with VSCode Theming API
content.we-commerce: Full featured e-commerce store, crafted with Next.JS, Nest.JS, Node.JS, Tailwindcss and Typescript.
content.bug-tracker: Bug Tracker App built with React.JS and Typescript
content.bug-tracker-server: Bug Tracker Restful API built with Typescript, Node.JS + Express.JS + MongoDB on the Back-end
content.url-shortner: Url Shortner App, built with Node.JS and Express.JS (backend), React.JS and Typescript (frontend).
content.notes-app: Notes App made with React.JS + Styled-Components + Sass
content.tasks-app: Contacts and Tasks Application made with Javascript, React.JS and Node.JS + Express.JS + MongoDB on the Back-end
content.tasks-app-server: Server Restful API for Contacts and Tasks App, made with Javascript, Node.JS, Express.JS and Mongo DB
content.barber-shop-website: Barber Shop  Website made using Typescript, React.JS and Tailwindcss
content.restaurant-demo: Restaurant Website made using React.JS and Typescript + Tailwindcss
content.hagira-store-server: Server Restful API for Hagira E-commerce Website, made with Javascript, Node.JS, Express.JS and Mongo DB

contact.title: Contact me
contact.intro-title: Let's bring ideas to life with code!
contact.intro-phrase: Hi! I'm here to help people turn their ideas into reality. If you are stuck with a project, want to start something new or just need some advice on where you can go from here‚ÄîI'd love to talk it over with you and see what we can do together. choconotey.title: Choconotey Notes App üìî
choconotey.description:
Taking notes in markdown is made simple with this application. It provides the core features to create, organize, filter, share and export/output your notes content in multiple formats like Markdown, HTML and plain text.
Jammed with auto sync, app and data control settings, soft layout animations, a robust editor and clean interface for ease  and distraction free experience.
Good to give it a try! üéàüéâüéä

toono.title: Toono Community
toono.description:
Meet a social constructive content oriented platform inspired by dev.to that allows people around the globe to share their career experience and grow by writing valuable content, build their professional profiles and take part in social discussions. All mates are welcome to find a place within our community.
A platform made for everyone who wants to share, contribute and learn something. ü•≥

palletone.title: Palletone Colors App üé®
palletone.description:
This app aims to bring a new experience of collecting, managing and building color palettes for designers and web developers.
The main goal is to simplify the process providing the right tools for choosing the preferred color for their project.
Feel free to try it on any device of yours and bake your own color flavor for your next project! ü•≥

rubymart.title: Rubymart Platform  ü´Çüõíüá≤üáø
rubymart.description:
Imagine an open platform where anyone can power their businesses by constructing a community of costumers, sell products, create user and store profiles, rate products, offer jobs, share ideias and make real connections!
This is the app that accomplishes it.
A perfect fusion of e-commerce and social community business platform.
 Explore my github for more!
